wikitext.*:
'''KHAN''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Root]] signifying "understand, comprehend". <ref name=":0">{{LR|P3}}, p. 363</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]] <ref name=":0" />
**hanya ''v.'' "to understand, know about, be skilled in dealing with"
**hande ''n.'' "knowledge, understanding"
**handa ''adj.'' "understanding, intelligent"
**handele ''n. "''intellect"
**handasse ''n.'' "intelligence"
*[[Exilic Quenya]] <ref name=":0" />
**henio ''v.'' "to understand"
**hann, hand ''adj.'' "intelligent"
**hannas ''n.'' "understanding, intelligence"
